title: Right Now
description: Lilly Aldern finds herself without a job,so she is hired to work as a secretary for her brother and his partner. When investigating the workings of an aerospace company, Legacy Towers, they come across a strange man named Joe that should have his own knowledge of their workings; yet his memory of the past has somehow been almost completely taken away.Strangely, this seems to have enabled a brief glimpse of the future for him.
author: Sarah Baethge
